short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes simple and fast terminal from original btc-e homepage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now you can block unfunctional (and functional) sections of btc-e.com homepage!

 - block CHAT
 - block all right sidebar
 - block CHARTS
 - block trade history
 - block buy/sell order lists
 - etc

UPD: integration with bitcoinWisdom (!)
